title: Holy man
creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Roger Birnbaum and Stephen Herek
brief_description: An examination and re-evaluation of morals and ethics drives this comedy/drama about a television executive and a marketing manager who despite loathing each other, must work together. The two identify their misguided paths assisted by an enigmatic character named ‘G’, who seems to possess miraculous powers. Stars Eddie Murphy (as G), Jeff Goldblum and Kelly Preston.
